dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
MPAA is requesting my personal info form my internet provider Road Runner.My computer is a family computer.I downloaded and ran the program ParentScanFile.I found a few movie files I didn't know was on my computer.I removed the deleted all files copy righted or not that the program said was on my harddrive.As well as locked out all family members from internet acess.
 Gentlemen my family is poor.Me and my wife clear only $1500 a month.
This lawsuit came as a big shock to me.I had no idea files was being downloaded or shared.Acess to the materal is so easy.I have told other family members not to use my computer for such materal.To my dismay I found some on it.
 Please gentlemen any help you can provide to help me in this bad time would be very welcome.
 As far as paying for a privte lawyer.I can't afford one.My family barely makes ends meet each month.
 Please please any help you can provide would be wonderful and deeply grateful          
                                 Signed Michael Nicholson
